name: FetchSchema
description: Fetch a specific schema with its nested versions.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.
**latest_version**: The latest version published of this schema.
**latest_version_date_created**: The date that the latest schema version was created, given in ISO 8601 format.
**links**: Contains a dictionary of URL links to nested resources of this schema.
